plugins.name: Nginx
plugins.description: Nginx is a web server and a reverse proxy server for HTTP, HTTPS, SMTP, POP3, and IMAP protocols, with a strong focus on high concurrency, performance and low memory usage.

plugins.name: Redis
plugins.description: Redis is an in-memory data structure store, used as a database, cache and message broker.

plugins.name: DooAliOSS
plugins.description: DooAliOSS is a plugin for DooTask to support AliOSS storage. Note: This is a local image

plugins.description: DooTxCOS is a plugin for DooTask to support AliOSS storage. Note: This is a local image

plugins.name: DooQiNiu
plugins.description: DooQiNiu is a plugin for DooTask to support AliOSS storage. Note: This is a local image

plugins.description: Nginx is a web server and a reverse proxy server for HTTP, HTTPS, SMTP, POP3, and IMAP protocols, with a strong focus on high concurrency, performance and low memory usage.

plugins.name: DooCloudDisk
OKR
思维导图
plugins.docker_compose:
version: '3'

services:
  minder:
    container_name: ${CONTAINER_NAME}
    image: "kuaifan/minder:0.1.3"
    networks:
      ${DOOTASK_NETWORK_NAME}:
        ipv4_address: "${DOOTASK_APP_IPPR}.10"
    restart: unless-stopped
    cpus: "${CPUS}"
    mem_limit: "${MEMORY_LIMIT}"
    labels:
      createdBy: "Apps"

networks:
  ${DOOTASK_NETWORK_NAME}:
    external: true

plugins.name: 图表
plugins.docker_compose:
services:
  drawio-webapp:
    image: jgraph/drawio:24.7.17
    restart: unless-stopped
    container_name: ${CONTAINER_NAME}
    networks:
      ${DOOTASK_NETWORK_NAME}:
        ipv4_address: "${DOOTASK_APP_IPPR}.8"
    volumes:
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/drawio/webapp/index.html:/usr/local/tomcat/webapps/draw/index.html
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/drawio/webapp/stencils:/usr/local/tomcat/webapps/draw/stencils
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/drawio/webapp/js/app.min.js:/usr/local/tomcat/webapps/draw/js/app.min.js
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/drawio/webapp/js/croppie/croppie.min.css:/usr/local/tomcat/webapps/draw/js/croppie/croppie.min.css
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/drawio/webapp/js/diagramly/ElectronApp.js:/usr/local/tomcat/webapps/draw/js/diagramly/ElectronApp.js

    cpus: "${CPUS}"
    mem_limit: "${MEMORY_LIMIT}"
    labels:
      createdBy: "Apps"

networks:
  ${DOOTASK_NETWORK_NAME}:
    external: true

plugins.name: 审批中心
plugins.docker_compose:
services:
  approve:
    image: kuaifan/dooapprove:0.1.5
    restart: unless-stopped
    container_name: ${CONTAINER_NAME}
    networks:
      ${DOOTASK_NETWORK_NAME}:
        ipv4_address: "${DOOTASK_APP_IPPR}.11"
    environment:
      TZ: "${TIMEZONE:-PRC}"
      MYSQL_HOST: "${DOOTASK_DB_HOST}"
      MYSQL_PORT: "${DOOTASK_DB_PORT}"
      MYSQL_DBNAME: "${DOOTASK_DB_DATABASE}"
      MYSQL_USERNAME: "${DOOTASK_DB_USERNAME}"
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: "${DOOTASK_DB_PASSWORD}"
      MYSQL_Prefix: "${DOOTASK_DB_PREFIX}approve_"
    cpus: "${CPUS}"
    mem_limit: "${MEMORY_LIMIT}"
    labels:
      createdBy: "Apps"

networks:
  ${DOOTASK_NETWORK_NAME}:
    external: true

plugins.name: OnlyOffice
plugins.docker_compose:
version: '3'

services:
  office:
    container_name: "${CONTAINER_NAME}"
    image: "onlyoffice/documentserver:8.2.2.1"
    volumes:
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/office/logs:/var/log/onlyoffice
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/office/data:/var/www/onlyoffice/Data
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/office/resources/require.js:/var/www/onlyoffice/documentserver/web-apps/vendor/requirejs/require.js
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/office/resources/common/main/resources/img/header:/var/www/onlyoffice/documentserver/web-apps/apps/common/main/resources/img/header
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/office/resources/documenteditor/main/resources/css/app.css:/var/www/onlyoffice/documentserver/web-apps/apps/documenteditor/main/resources/css/app.css
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/office/resources/documenteditor/mobile/css/526.caf35c11a8d72ca5ac85.css:/var/www/onlyoffice/documentserver/web-apps/apps/documenteditor/mobile/css/526.caf35c11a8d72ca5ac85.css
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/office/resources/presentationeditor/main/resources/css/app.css:/var/www/onlyoffice/documentserver/web-apps/apps/presentationeditor/main/resources/css/app.css
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/office/resources/presentationeditor/mobile/css/923.f9cf19de1a25c2e7bf8b.css:/var/www/onlyoffice/documentserver/web-apps/apps/presentationeditor/mobile/css/923.f9cf19de1a25c2e7bf8b.css
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/office/resources/spreadsheeteditor/main/resources/css/app.css:/var/www/onlyoffice/documentserver/web-apps/apps/spreadsheeteditor/main/resources/css/app.css
      - ${DOOTASK_DIR}/docker/office/resources/spreadsheeteditor/mobile/css/611.1bef49f175e18fc085db.css:/var/www/onlyoffice/documentserver/web-apps/apps/spreadsheeteditor/mobile/css/611.1bef49f175e18fc085db.css
    environment:
      JWT_SECRET: ${DOOTASK_APP_KEY}
    networks:
      ${DOOTASK_NETWORK_NAME}:
        ipv4_address: "${DOOTASK_APP_IPPR}.6"
    restart: unless-stopped
    cpus: "${CPUS}"
    mem_limit: "${MEMORY_LIMIT}"
    labels:
      createdBy: "Apps"

networks:
  ${DOOTASK_NETWORK_NAME}:
    external: true

plugins.name: 人脸签到打卡
plugins.docker_compose:
version: '3'

services:
  face:
    container_name: "dootask-face-${APP_ID}"
    image: "hitosea2020/dooface:0.0.1"
    ports:
      - "7788:7788"
    environment:
      TZ: "${TIMEZONE:-PRC}"
      STORAGE: mysql
      MYSQL_HOST: "${DOOTASK_DB_HOST}"
      MYSQL_PORT: "${DOOTASK_DB_PORT}"
      MYSQL_USERNAME: "${DOOTASK_DB_USERNAME}"
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: "${DOOTASK_DB_PASSWORD}"
      MYSQL_DB_NAME: "${DOOTASK_DB_DATABASE}"
      DB_PREFIX: "${DOOTASK_DB_PREFIX}"
      REPORT_API: "http://${DOOTASK_APP_IPPR}.3/api/public/checkin/report"
    networks:
      ${DOOTASK_NETWORK_NAME}:
        ipv4_address: "${DOOTASK_APP_IPPR}.14"
    restart: unless-stopped
    cpus: "${CPUS}"
    mem_limit: "${MEMORY_LIMIT}"
    labels:
      createdBy: "Apps"

networks:
  ${DOOTASK_NETWORK_NAME}:
    external: true

plugins.name: AI机器人
plugins.docker_compose:
version: '3'

services:
  ai:
    container_name: "${CONTAINER_NAME}"
    image: "kuaifan/dootask-ai:0.2.6"
    environment:
      REDIS_HOST: "${DOOTASK_REDIS_HOST}"
      REDIS_PORT: "${DOOTASK_REDIS_PORT}"
    networks:
      ${DOOTASK_NETWORK_NAME}:
        ipv4_address: "${DOOTASK_APP_IPPR}.12"
    restart: unless-stopped
    cpus: "${CPUS}"
    mem_limit: "${MEMORY_LIMIT}"
    labels:
      createdBy: "Apps"

networks:
  ${DOOTASK_NETWORK_NAME}:
    external: true
